name: Score Grid (itch)
description:
Super Grid is an arcade-style sports game where the player must achieve a better score than the opponent.

Each goal will be rated on a scale of 1 to 10, depending on the current grid size and the distance at which the goal was scored from. Each time a goal is scored, the grid of the player who scored will become bigger.  

The player and the opponent can score an unlimited amount of goals, but only their two highest-scoring goals will be counted.

Note: The current version is only for demonstration purposes and does not represent the final look of the game. This is currently just a demo, as the game is still under development.

Currently accepting donations for further developing of the game and to support the addition of new features.
